Class DropletMetadata

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.resource.DropletMetadata
public final class DropletMetadata extends Object
Information about the droplet that the JVM is running in.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Integer
    getDropletId(DigitalOceanClient client)
    Returns the ID of the droplet that the JVM is running on.
    static String

    Returns the hostname of the droplet that the JVM is running on.
    static String
    getRegion(DigitalOceanClient client)
    Returns the region of the droplet that the JVM is running on.

  • Method Details

    • getDropletId

      public static Integer getDropletId(DigitalOceanClient client) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Returns the ID of the droplet that the JVM is running on.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      Returns:
      null if the JVM is unable to detect the droplet that it is running on
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if client is null
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.
